mini biography: 'Letitia Wright' (qv) is a British-Guyanese actress. She is known for her portrayal of Shuri in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, beginning in 2018 with _Black Panther (2018)_ (qv) and _Avengers: Infinity War (2018)_ (qv), and for the film _Urban Hymn (2015)_ (qv). She has also starred in _The Commuter (2018)_ (qv) and _Ready Player One (2018)_ (qv), and in the 2017 Black Mirror episode _Black Mirror: Black Museum (2017)_ (qv). Her film debut was _Victim (2011)_ (qv).Letitia was born in Georgetown, Guyana, and moved to London, England, when she was seven. She grew up in Tottenham.::Pedro Borges
trivia: One of Screen International Stars of Tomorrow 2012.
Selected as one of Wonderland Magazine's Best Of Next 2015.

Counts actresses 'Keke Palmer' (qv) and 'Naomie Harris' (qv) as major influences while she was growing up, Keke's _Akeelah and the Bee (2006)_ (qv) being a film that made her yearn to become an actress.
Is a huge fan of 'Damien Chazelle' (qv)'s _Whiplash (2014)_ (qv).
